Package net.silthus.schat.message

Interface MessageSource

All Superinterfaces:
Identified, Pointered
All Known Subinterfaces:
Chatter
public interface MessageSource extends Identified, Pointered
A message source can be anything that is Identified and used to send messages.

The primary source of messages is the Chatter, but any Identity can be wrapped as a source using the of(Identity) method.

Since:
1.0.0
